name: Getting Around Indianapolis International Airport - Complete Airport Tour
description:
Thanks for joining me on this tour of Indianapolis International Airport! Today's tour covers the busiest airport in Indiana, which provides service to dozens of destinations in the United States, Mexico, and Canada. Indianapolis's central location makes it a nexus of travel for world-famous sports and cultural events, so this airport needs to function efficiently while not being too large to overwhelm visitors!

IND is an award-winning airport for a number of reasons, and I hope my video shows you the ease with which you can transit through, and the things you can do while you're here! See both terminals, how to get around, and where to find what you need during your time at IND!

I do a lot of original research while preparing these videos, so please leave a comment below if you have questions about the tour or navigating the airport, and I'll do my best to answer them! Or, share your own thoughts and experiences about IND!

Finally, let me know where you'd like to see next! Stay tuned for new flight and airport videos every weekend!

Please travel safely!
